name: Mentorship & Coaching
shortDescription: Expert pairing and guidance for business success.
longDescription: We provide expert pairing and personalized guidance services to ensure your professional growth and business success through tailored mentorship programs.

featuresList.title: Executive Coaching
featuresList.description: For personalized, one-on-one guidance on advanced strategy and leadership development.

featuresList.title: Executive Shadowing & Board Immersion
featuresList.description: For top founders to learn high-level governance and organizational structure firsthand.

featuresList.title: Peer-to-Peer Learning
featuresList.description: Through structured group coaching and collaborative problem-solving.
